scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of transcripts from interviews conducted by Victor Affonso for research in his thesis, A Descriptive Study of Selected Viewpoints on The Teaching of Broadcast Communication Arts: A Basis for Guidance of The Degree Program in Communication Arts. Includes interviews with 13 faculty members from universities in Los Angeles, New York, and Montreal. The thesis was intended as a practical tool for communication studies in India.
